EmailTemplate.name: Digital First.4-05-21 DBNK DF Email 6.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Accelerating the Journey to Digital-First Banking
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Everyone now has a banking app. But that’s not what it means to be digital-first.
“We’ve seen a dramatic change in our clients—banks and credit unions—and their customers’ expectations around great customer experience, and in particular, digitally led experiences,” says Doug Brown, NCR’s SVP & GM of Digital Banking.
But if you’re still not connecting digital and physical experiences, how do you learn the next steps to advance your shift to digital-first banking?
Watch as we discuss how to accelerate your institution’s digital journey. ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
